  • Constructor Details

    • Island

      public Island(int id, boolean next, boolean prev, TowerType tower, com.google.gson.JsonObject students, boolean motherNature, boolean ban)
      Default constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the island.
      next - true if connected to next island.
      prev - true if connected to previous island.
      tower - The tower on the island.
      students - The students on the island.
      motherNature - true if Mother Nature is on the island.
      ban - true if the island is banned.
